description: Public works government services canada purchaser need for the procurement purchase and delivery and ?, But basically they want to Buy chairs
full_summary:
Public Works and Government Services Canada's (PWGSC) Real Property Branch is seeking a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of office seating for the Canada Border Services Agency.

**RFP Information**
_____________________

*  RFP Title: Seating for the Canada Border Services Agency
*  Reference Number: WS4252223243
*  Solicitation Number: WS4252223243
*  Publication Date: October 11, 2023
*  Tender Closing Date and Time: October 26, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
*  Amendment Date: October 20, 2023
*  Expected Contract Start Date: November 29, 2023
*  Expected Contract End Date: June 30, 2024

**Procurement Details**
_____________________

The procurement category is associated with the Government of Canada's Good Governance requirements.

This Request for Proposal (RFP) involves a competitive, selective tendering process. The selection criteria based on the lowest price.

The Government of Canada has not specified any trade agreements for this procurement.

**Delivery and Contact Information**
_____________________

The delivery location is Ottawa, Ontario.

The contracting entity contact information is as follows:
*  Constantinos Tountas (SPAC/PSPC)
*  E-mail: constantinos.tountas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*  Phone: Not available
*  Fax: Not available

**Notice and Documents**
_____________________

This Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can be viewed and downloaded from the following website, once logged in with a valid SAP Ariba account:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17692623

Please disregard the CanadaBuys response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 26, 2023 by 2:00 p.m. EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 p.m. EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  

The PWGSC's Real Property Branch, on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency, is interested in purchasing, delivering and installing office seating in the National Capital Region.


I used the following techniques to rephrase the text:
- removal of repetition of similar information
- elimination of redudant words and phrases 
- reorganization of the passage for better clarity.
- modification of the sentences to make them concise and more readable.
